findings.title: Wrong file permission
findings.description: Inconsistent file permissions (/autogen.sh, /depends/config.guess, /depends/config.sub, /share/genbuild.sh) with mode 100644 and new mode 100755

findings.title: (buffer) strlen: Does not handle strings that are not \0terminated
findings.description: The function strncpy is used incorrectly and does not always \0terminate or check for invalid pointers.

findings.title: (port) snprintf: On some very old systems, snprintf is incorrectly implemented and permits buffer overflows;
findings.description: snprintf can cause buffer overflows on some very old systems due to incorrect implementation.

findings.title: (buffer) strncpy: Easily used incorrectly; doesn’t always \0terminate or check for invalid pointers.
findings.description: The function strncpy can be easily misused as it does not guarantee null termination and may not check for invalid pointers, leading to potential security issues.

findings.title: (access) umask: Ensure that umask is given most restrictive possible setting (e.g., 066 or 077)
findings.description: Ensure that umask is given most restrictive possible setting to prevent potential security risks

findings.title: (misc) fopen: Check when opening files
findings.description: Check when opening files to prevent an attacker from redirecting it via symlinks, forcing the opening of special file types, moving things around to create a race condition, controlling its ancestors, or changing its contents.
findings.lineNumber: src/addrdb.cpp:40, src/addrdb.cpp:65, src/addrdb.cpp:137, src/addrdb.cpp:162, src/util.cpp:659, src/util.cpp:695, src/util.cpp:845

findings.title: (buffer) char: Statically-sized arrays can be overflowed
findings.description: Statically-sized arrays can be overflowed. Perform bounds checking, use functions that limit length, or ensure that the size is larger than the maximum possible length.
findings.lineNumber: src/util.cpp:861, src/util.cpp:899, src/utilstrencodings.cpp:35, src/utilstrencodings.h:99, src/validation.cpp:4209, src/wallet/crypter.cpp:27, src/protocol.h:40, src/pubkey.cpp:30

findings.title: (buffer) memcpy: Does not check for buffer overflows when copying to destination
findings.description: Does not check for buffer overflows when copying to destination. Make sure destination can always hold the source data.
